<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Breakthrough](/Feats.aspx?ID=3113) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Inventor](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=108)

**Prerequisites**
[Inventor Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3112)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [inventor feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=19/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Breakthrough leads to...</title>
[Advanced Breakthrough](/Feats.aspx?ID=3115)
name: Basic Breakthrough
